ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Alchemy tips
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thank you. I was at 21 in alchemy a few hours ago. I brought it up to 23 making Distillate of Alacrity I. I have a long way to go before it will be worth
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:29 AM 12/3/2006 -0500, you wrote:

>My husband plays a Shammy and he Grandmastered his alchemy recently by
>doing just the recipes for the Clarity X potions. He says you can get
>everything you need on potion merchants pretty cheap with the exception of
>nodding blue lilies which you can either buy in bazaar, forage on a
>character that has forage ability or go to Old Sebilis and kill the
>froggies for them, fairly good drop rate there and probably your best and
>cheapest bet for getting them. Hope that helps. :)
>
>Silverminx
>74 Druid ~ Bristlebane Server

Thank you. I was at 21 in alchemy a few hours ago. I brought it up to 23
making Distillate of Alacrity I. I have a long way to go before it will be
worth the expense in failures to do a Clarity X. I'm just a level 44 kitty.

Do you bring the points up faster if you mix the more advanced stuff? I'm
just asking because I really don't know.

I got two shawls doing Great Divide quests. The giants in the Great Divide
don't like me anymore. G.

Edward Fox
